$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

injection_base_url.description: Base URL for the Service Provider's implementation of the interfaces/automated-testing/rid/injection.yaml API

local_debug.description:
Whether this Service Provider instance is running locally for debugging or development purposes. Mostly used for relaxing
constraints around encryption.

participant_id.description: ID of the NetRID Service Provider into which test data can be injected
